Flow.interviewLabel: Screen Flow: Convert Case to Project {!$Flow.CurrentDateTime}
Flow.label: Screen Flow: Convert Case to Project

fields.name: headerScreen1
fields.fieldText: Convert Case to Project

fields.name: displayConvertCaseInfo
fields.fieldText: You can use this flow to convert a Case into a Project, if you determine that the work involved with solving the case, warrants this.

fields.name: displayNotifyCaseCreatorInfo
fields.fieldText:
Information about the notification:


  • An email will be generated with info about the conversion
  • Users you select below, will be added as CC recipients.
  • The original creator of the case, {!Get_Case.SuppliedName}, will automatically be notified on {!Get_Case.SuppliedEmail}.

value.stringValue: This case is being converted into a project due to the fact that...

fields.name: headerScreen2
fields.fieldText:
Add Main Recipient


The field Supplied Email/Web Email on Case is empty.

Please add a main recipient of the notification.

textTemplates.name: EmailBody
textTemplates.text:
Dear {!Get_Case.SuppliedName},


Your case with the subject "{!Get_Case.Subject}" has been converted into a Project.

You can find the Project here: {!ProjectRecord.Name}


The Project was created from a Case you recently opened.

You can find the Case here: Source Case


Notes:

{!Note}

textTemplates.name: EmailSubject
textTemplates.text: Updated on the Status on Your Recent Case
